name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Taiwanese players won the gold medal in the men's doubles badminton final at the Paris Olympics on August 4. The flag of Chinese Taipei was slowly raised at the scene and many Taiwanese sang the national flag anthem of the Republic of China.
Chinese netizens responded, "If Taiwan wins, it's also China's win" and "It's okay, first and second are both Chinese."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Taiwanese people celebrate this moment

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 4, the media reported that the unit price of Wanhe Guanggu, a well-known real estate project in Wuhan, has been halved from more than 20,000 yuan at the time of filing to 12,500 yuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Luzhou, Sichuan

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: As of now, all videos posted by bloggers about running for county party secretary or county mayor have been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 5, Japanese stocks plunged 12.4%, and Taiwan stocks fell 8.4%, hitting a record high. The topic #A-share performance is the best in the world# became a hot search on that day, triggering ridicule from netizens. Netizens replied, "It has been falling for many years, and you still have the nerve to say that."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 5, Lianyungang, Jiangsu. A woman posted a video to report Cui Dezhi, the leader of the Haizhou District Petition Bureau, under her real name, saying that he had beaten her husband, and published a video of her husband being beaten. As of now, the video of the report posted by the woman has been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 5 (Released) Baoding, Hebei. A blogger named "Xiao Ma Ge" who has long been monitoring law enforcement officers found that the urban management had detained a vendor's sign on the roadside. The blogger asked the urban management to show their law enforcement certificates and penalty notices. Finally, with the help of the blogger, the vendor got his things back. The vendor said, "(The urban management) always bullies people. How hard it is for ordinary people to live now!"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 5 (Released) Yulin, Shaanxi. A man posted a video to report that Jia Yu, vice chairman of the Zizhou County Federation of Industry and Commerce, had impersonated him to go to school.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 3, Xiang Ligang, the founder of Feixiang.com, posted a message saying, "If there is someone with Ma Xiangyu's personality in our company, I will definitely fire him. We must not let such a person make the company a mess." As of now, this post has been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, it was circulated online that the topics of law papers cannot involve criminal compliance, source of litigation management, proactive judicial practice, and equal protection of private enterprises. Some netizens said that they have received internal notifications.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 5, the situation of the student protest in Bangladesh took a major turn. Prime Minister Hasina announced her resignation and fled to India with her sister on a Bangladesh Air Force helicopter.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The victorious students stormed into Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina's residence and laid on her bed

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 4, Zhang Weiwei, a distinguished professor at Fudan University, won this year's Higher Education Scientific Research Achievement Award for his book This is China: China's Power Going to the World.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
He Guangwei, a famous blogger, revealed that an 83-year-old man was fined 10,000 yuan by the Zhengzhou High-tech Zone People's Court for insulting a judge for three hours, and was required to pay the fine before August 5. 
In response, He Guangwei said, "Can the three-hour video of insulting the judge be made public? And does this 83-year-old man have 10,000 yuan?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a Yunnan netizen posted a photo of the local government distributing a "central farmland protection subsidy" of only RMB 1.6. Another netizen from Guangxi said that he only received RMB 955 for a total of more than 20 mu of land, which was half less than in previous years.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A recording of a phone call was circulated online. When faced with questions, Lake responded, "How did I violate my conscience? Did I give her money? She volunteered." According to Upstream News on August 5, Lake was taken away for investigation six months ago for suspected duty-related crimes.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On July 16, during the student protests in Bangladesh, police fired tear gas and used batons to disperse the protesting students. During this period, Abu Sayyed was left alone, facing the gun with his arms open.
Finally, the police shot Abu Sayyed, and he became the first victim of the protest.
The image of Abu facing death inspired and encouraged more and more Bangladeshis to take to the streets. In order to commemorate him, the students named the intersection where he died after him.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
A Taobao seller said that his store suffered a large-scale deposit fraud. A large number of accounts used the mechanism of applying for compensation for delayed delivery to defraud the seller's deposit. The Internet is also full of various "compensation" tutorials and recruitment advertisements. The problem could not be effectively handled by reporting to the police or contacting Taobao customer service.
On social media, a large number of Taobao sellers said that they had encountered the same fraud experience.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Bangladesh Army Chief General Waq-Uz Zaman made a televised address to the nation, confirming that Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina had resigned and announcing the formation of an interim government.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On August 2, the Ministry of Housing and Urban-Rural Development: Accelerate the construction of regular housing physical examinations, housing insurance, and housing pension systems.
Netizens responded, "Everyone will need a physical examination in the future, once a week, 20 yuan each time" and "Doctor, I want to make an appointment for my house"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
In recent days, student protests have lasted for several weeks in Bangladesh.
Initially, students demanded the abolition of the controversial civil service quota system, but then it evolved into a nationwide protest demanding the resignation of Prime Minister Hasina. 
What is the quota system? What are the similarities between Xi Jinping and Hasina? Why did the Bangladesh student movement make Chinese netizens "feel very sympathetic"?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 4, a retired female navy soldier reported the workshop director of the Nanchang branch of the Jiangxi Electric Power Company of the State Power Investment Group and others, saying that the director tried to enter the Jiangxi Provincial People's Congress through her, but was rejected, and she began to be retaliated by several people. She said that the director once asked her to "take good care of her breasts."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
August 4, Luohe, Henan. A man posted a video saying that he was caught by the police for drunk driving. During the period, the police began to search the vehicle on the grounds that the man cursed, and was beaten.
After a bystander called the police, the police tried to leave. The man refused to let them leave on the grounds that he was beaten, but the police denied it and threatened, "Who hit you? Tell me clearly, was it me or him?" and snatched his dashcam.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
August 4, Shanghai. A lawyer said that the current criminal crackdown is gradually becoming widespread and expanding. 
People were arrested for clearly having economic disputes, and those who were clearly eligible for administrative penalties were also arrested. Some people first received administrative penalties and paid the money, thinking that they were fine, but they were arrested after paying the money for a while.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Bangladesh, people celebrating victory shake hands with soldiers on the roadside.
Commentators believe that the Bangladeshi military chose to stand on the side of the people at the last moment, which became the key to forcing Hasina to flee in embarrassment.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On August 3, Pantea Holdings (Guangzhou) issued a "Reorganization Announcement" announcing the collapse of the company. In recent days, a large number of dealers have gone to the company to defend their rights.
Industry insiders said that this is the biggest thunder in Guangzhou Fangcun Tea Market so far. Although it was established when financial tea frequently collapsed, its returns have remained high, attracting a large number of tea merchants to pursue it. In two years, it quickly became a giant tea company in the tea market, involving tens of billions.
"Financial tea" has a set of conventional methods: first, grandly launch a new brand and advocate its scarcity and market prospects. For example, manufacturers use luxurious store decoration, high-profile opening celebrations, high-end tasting activities, etc., on the one hand, to demonstrate the company's strong strength, and on the other hand, vigorously promote a certain tea with high collection and investment value, and put it into the market through momentum and limited supply.

Then create the illusion of tea price increase. Zhang Wei, executive vice president of the Guangzhou Tea Association, said that corporate salesmen will seize various opportunities...
fullContent:
8月3日，泛茶控股（广州）发布一则《关于重组公告》，宣布暴雷。连日来大量经销商前往公司维权。
业内人士表示，这是迄今为止广州芳村茶市最大的雷，虽然它成立于金融茶频频爆雷之际，但由于它的回报一直居高不下，引发大批茶商追捧，两年时间迅速成为茶市中的巨无霸式的茶企，涉及上百亿。
“金融茶”有一套常规手法：首先是隆重推出新品牌，鼓吹其稀缺性和市场前景。比如厂家通过豪华的门店装修、高调的开业庆典、高端的品鉴活动等方式，一方面彰显企业的雄厚实力，另一方面极力宣传某款茶叶具有很高的收藏和投资价值，通过造势、捂盘限量投入市场。

然后是营造茶叶涨价的假象。广州茶叶协会常务副会长张伟说，企业业务员会抓住各种机会将潜在客户拉进一个个微信群，然后安排人员按一定节奏不断加价收货或者卖货，形成涨价的假象，带动更多人争相购买。

最后是高位抛盘割韭菜，提现走人，再制造或寻找下一个风口锚点。“明眼人一看，就知道这是一场精心设计的击鼓传花骗局。庄家做局，营造价格看涨的氛围，让投资者在前期尝到甜头。等到投资者投入越来越多，最后突然收网甩盘，泡沫被戳穿

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On August 5, Chen Zhiwei, the police officer who responded to the Tangshan barbecue restaurant beating case, released a video with his real name to report that he was wrongly imprisoned and that he was subjected to illegal interrogation during the investigation, which resulted in illegal transcripts.
Chen Zhiwei specifically pointed out that the transcripts completed by the investigators at the time did not truthfully record the true situation of the 610 incident, deliberately concealing the truth, and finally letting Chen Zhiwei, a grassroots police officer, take the blame and forcibly convicted him of fabricated charges.
Chen Zhiwei tried to redress his injustice and wrote two handwritten letters of appeal to appeal within the organization, but the submitted letters of appeal fell into the sea and no news was heard.
According to him: When he received the police call on June 10, he was not the police officer in charge of the dispatch. When he received the police notification, it was almost 3 a.m. He was ordered to rush to the scene in just over 10 minutes.
In order to handle this police incident, he spent more than 3 hours that day, from dusk to dawn, and made many positive promotions...
fullContent:
8月5日，唐山烧烤店打人案出警民警陈志伟发布视频实名举报，称自己含冤入狱，声称自己在办案期间遭受了违规审讯，从而获取了非法笔录。
陈志伟特别指出当时办案人员完成的笔录并未如实记录610事件的真实情况，故意掩盖事实真相，最后还让身为基层民警的陈志伟兜底背黑锅，对其罗织罪名强行定罪。
陈志伟尝试为自己伸冤，曾两次手写申诉信进行组织内申诉，然而递交的申诉信却就此石沉大海，杳无音信。
据他讲述：6月10日案发接警时，他根本不是负责出警的民警，等他得到警情通知时，已经将近凌晨3点了，他临危受命，只用了10几分钟就赶到了现场。
为了处理这起警情，他当天就花费了3个多小时，从天黑处理到天亮，做了很多积极推动案情处理的工作。
在之后的新闻采访中，陈志伟如实回答了自己的出警时间，却被现场的市级领导拍桌子威胁命令“照着我们给你的稿子念”。之后，唐山市曹妃甸区办案人员，对他采用违规的审讯手段，从而获得非法笔录。为了掩盖相关事实真相，办案人员不如实记录笔录，还给作为基层民警的他强制定罪，最终导致他被判处1年零1个月的有期徒刑。
他表示：自己会陆续将这起案件的来龙去脉说清楚，他手上有客观的录像、录音、聊天记录、人证等作为证据，自己愿为所说的每一句话负法律责任。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: While the people of Bangladesh were celebrating their victory, some extremist Muslims began to take advantage of the situation to attack local Hindus and burn their houses and temples.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Tariq Rahman, acting chairman of the Bangladesh Nationalist Party, called on all parties to remain calm. He said that during the 15 years of this fascist regime, many children lost their beloved fathers and many wives lost their beloved husbands... With the fall of this brutal government, the Bangladeshi people have paved the way for the reconstruction of democracy, human rights and the destroyed right to vote.
So far, the first step of the great revolution of the Bangladeshi people has been successfully completed.
In order to achieve the ultimate goal of the people's historic revolution, free, fair and just elections should be organized as soon as possible. Power should be transferred to the representatives elected by the people as soon as possible to establish a free, equal and democratic Bangladesh-only in this way can the historic revolution of the Bangladeshi people finally succeed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, in Wuli Town, Lingshan County, Guangxi.
The developer and villagers had a dispute over road construction. The developer tried to secretly dig the road in the middle of the night but was stopped by the villagers.
The police intervened during the day and arrested some villagers.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Hasina arrived in India and left in a convoy.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, the State Council announced the decision to invalidate 183 "historical documents" in a private manner.
These documents include several epidemic prevention work plans and notices during the epidemic.
